page.title: 11CHARTER OF POSSESSIONS.
page.content: {GIRL.}I,Kate Coleman,inhabiting the bedroom at 5,Granville Crest,Offmore Farm,Kidderminster,state that I own the following:a teddy bear,a wardrobe a bed,a desk,a cupboard,another bed, atlas of the world,a game of "Race to the Roof",an enchanted forest,some lego and a book corner of zoo books. {BOY.}I,Paul Williams,inhabiting the bedroom at 33,Highfield Road,Greenhill state that I own the following:a four shelf library of books,184 "Buster" comics,268 "Look In's",a wardrobe,a chest of drawers,a Z.X. Spectrum computer,a bunk bed,3 Robo-machines,a portable T.V.,a record player and three footballs
